item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Passport Photos (507 points | 74 comments)
2. Trudeau government bans TikTok from operating in Canada (371 points | 206 comments)
3. Guy gives a negative review to Battlezone after playing 8k hours; He's right (113 points | 29 comments)
4. Visualizing binary files with ImHex's DSL, the "pattern language" (50 points | 4 comments)
5. Don't return named tuples in new APIs (35 points | 30 comments)
6. 131M American Buildings (103 points | 22 comments)
7. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (292 points | 125 comments)
8. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (265 points | 74 comments)
9. One year, 41M digits: How Luke Durant found the largest known prime number (31 points | 10 comments)
10. Show HN: SuperSplat – open-source 3D Gaussian Splat Editor (200 points | 44 comments)
11. Show HN: Aide, an open-source AI native IDE (145 points | 111 comments)
12. Physicists spot quantum tornadoes twirling in a 'supersolid' (48 points | 1 comment)
13. Launch HN: Midship (YC S24) – Turn PDFs, docs, and images into usable data (53 points | 34 comments)
14. Monorepo – Our Experience (133 points | 136 comments)
15. Forget CDK and AWS's insane costs. Pulumi and DigitalOcean to the rescue (94 points | 48 comments)
16. The evolutionary mystery of the German cockroach (15 points | 1 comment)
17. The deep learning boom caught almost everyone by surprise (233 points | 150 comments)
18. Australia proposes ban on social media for those under 16 (44 points | 13 comments)
19. Model Predictive Control in the Browser with WebAssembly (98 points | 12 comments)
20. Hacking cars in JavaScript (Replay attacks in the browser with the HackRF) (47 points | 1 comment)
21. Exposure to phthalate compromises brain function in adult vertebrates (88 points | 28 comments)
22. Listening in on the Mysterious Marbled Murrelet (5 points | discuss)
23. Sysadmin shock as Windows Server 2025 installs itself after labeling error (44 points | 8 comments)
24. Kernel optimization with BOLT (binary optimization and layout tool) (140 points | 17 comments)
25. WebSockets cost us $1M on our AWS bill (249 points | 153 comments)
26. Switch 2 will be backwards compatible with Switch (280 points | 172 comments)
27. Caring for yourself while caring for others (247 points | 45 comments)
28. Learning not to trust the All-In podcast (335 points | 162 comments)
29. 3D Rotation Design (102 points | 25 comments)
30. New images of Jupiter (426 points | 68 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
